channel.title: PhysBio on Modulhandbuch Physik/Astronomie der Universität Bonn
channel.description: Recent content in PhysBio on Modulhandbuch Physik/Astronomie der Universität Bonn

item.title: PhysBio
item.description: Physical biology (T/A) - PhysBio Course Physical biology (T/A) Course No. PhysBio Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Elective Lecture with exercises English 4+2 8 ST Requirements for Participation: Preparation: Advanced statistical mechanics Form of Testing and Examination: Oral examination Length of Course: 1 semester Aims of the Course: Acquaintance with basic concepts of molecular and evolutionary biology; understanding of statistical issues arising in the analysis of sequence data and the application of methods from statistical physics addressing them.
